GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with the given article_id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all the comments for a given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to an article given the article_id

exampleResponse.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments an articles votes by a given amount when passed an object of the form { inc_votes: newVote }

exampleResponse.body: before being passed {inc_votes : 1} this articles votes were 0
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
